noun.description: A person or thing that causes something to happen or develop more quickly.
examples: the country has been the main accelerator of global growth for a decade

noun.description: A device, typically a pedal, that controls the speed of a vehicle's engine.
examples: he pressed the accelerator to the floor and the taxi shot forward
the bank will have its foot on the accelerator until the economy starts to recover

noun.description: An apparatus for accelerating charged particles to high velocities; a particle accelerator.
